Title: Creates the class E felony of gang sexual assault, involving touching or removal of clothing with the aid of two or more people without the consent of the person
Summary: Creates the class E felony of gang sexual assault, involving touching or removal of clothing with the aid of two or more people without the consent of the person; includes such felony and the class A misdemeanor of forcible touching within the definition of "sex offense" for the purposes of the sex offender registration act.
LawCode: Add ยง130.54, amd ยง130.05, Pen L; amd ยง168-a, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the correction law, in relation to the new crime of gang sexual assault
